scenes.description: Performance of the song 'World is Mine'.
scenes.song_name: World is Mine (ワールドイズマイン)

subtitles.original: 無理だよね
subtitles.english: It's impossible, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: Because I make you cry,

subtitles.original: 胸がとても痛むんだ
subtitles.english: my chest hurts so much.

subtitles.original: 人間だからね
subtitles.english: Because we're human,

subtitles.original: たまには分かり合えなくなって
subtitles.english: sometimes we can't understand each other,

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: because I make you cry,

subtitles.original: また君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: because I make you cry again.

subtitles.original: でも自信がないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: But I have no, no, no confidence, you know.

subtitles.original: 変わりたくないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to change, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: 君以外会いたくないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to see anyone but you,

subtitles.original: なんて勝手だね
subtitles.english: how selfish of me.

subtitles.original: 大体曖昧だったよね
subtitles.english: It was mostly vague,

subtitles.original: 愛の存在証明なんて
subtitles.english: the proof of love's existence.

subtitles.original: 君がそこに居るのにね
subtitles.english: Even though you're right there.

subtitles.original: 何百回の夜を過ごしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how many hundreds of nights pass,

subtitles.original: 得られぬような
subtitles.english: that unattainable...

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べてみて
subtitles.english: ...'I love you's, try lining them up.

subtitles.original: 何百回の夜を過ごしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how many hundreds of nights pass,

subtitles.original: 得られぬような
subtitles.english: that unattainable...

subtitles.original: 最高級のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: ...highest-grade full course, please give it to me.

subtitles.original: 離れないで傍に居てくれたのは
subtitles.english: The one who stayed by my side without leaving was...

subtitles.original: 結局君一人だったよね
subtitles.english: ...you alone in the end, weren't you?

subtitles.original: 涙のスパイスは君の胸に
subtitles.english: The spice of tears in your heart...

subtitles.original: 残ってしまうだろうけど
subtitles.english: ...will probably remain, but...

subtitles.original: 何千回の夜を過ごしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how many thousands of nights pass,

subtitles.original: 得られぬような
subtitles.english: that unattainable...

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べるから
subtitles.english: ...'I love you's, I'll line them up.

subtitles.original: 何千回の夜を過ごしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how many thousands of nights pass,

subtitles.original: 得られぬような
subtitles.english: that unattainable...

subtitles.original: 最高級のフルコースを
subtitles.english: ...highest-grade full course...

subtitles.original: 何万回の夜を過ごしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how many tens of thousands of nights pass,

subtitles.original: 忘れぬような
subtitles.english: that unforgettable...

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べるから
subtitles.english: ...'I love you's, I'll line them up.

subtitles.original: 何万回の夜を過ごしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how many tens of thousands of nights pass,

subtitles.original: 忘れぬような
subtitles.english: that unforgettable...

subtitles.original: 最高級のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: ...highest-grade full course, please give it to me.

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the world,

subtitles.original: そういう扱い心得て
subtitles.english: make sure you know how to treat me like that.

subtitles.original: ワールドイズマイン
subtitles.english: World is Mine

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲 ryo
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: ryo

subtitles.original: その一 いつもと違う髪形に気がつくこと
subtitles.english: Number one: notice when my hairstyle is different from usual.

subtitles.original: その二 ちゃんと靴まで見ること いいね？
subtitles.english: Number two: look properly all the way down to my shoes, okay?

subtitles.original: その三 私の一言には三つの言葉で返事すること
subtitles.english: Number three: reply to my every word with three of your own.

subtitles.original: わかったら右手がお留守なのを何とかして！
subtitles.english: If you understand, do something about my right hand being empty!

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything.

subtitles.original: キミに心から思って欲しいの
subtitles.english: I want you to think from the bottom of your heart...

subtitles.original: かわいいって
subtitles.english: ...that I'm cute.

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the world.

subtitles.original: 気がついて ねえねえ
subtitles.english: Notice me, hey, hey.

subtitles.original: 待たせるなんて論外よ
subtitles.english: Keeping me waiting is out of the question.

subtitles.original: 私を誰だと思ってるの？
subtitles.english: Who do you think I am?

subtitles.original: もうなんだか
subtitles.english: Oh, honestly...

subtitles.original: 甘いものが食べたい！
subtitles.english: I want to eat something sweet!

subtitles.original: 今すぐによ
subtitles.english: Right now!

subtitles.original: おーっ！
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: チェックワンツー！
subtitles.english: Check one two!

subtitles.original: 欠点？かわいいの間違いでしょ
subtitles.english: Flaws? You must mean 'cute' instead.

subtitles.original: 文句は許しませんの
subtitles.english: I won't allow any complaints.

subtitles.original: あのね、私の話ちゃんと聞いてる？ちょっと！
subtitles.english: Listen, are you listening to what I'm saying? Hey!

subtitles.original: あ、それとね 白いお馬さん 決まってるでしょ？
subtitles.english: Ah, and also, a white horse is a given, right?

subtitles.original: 迎えに来て
subtitles.english: Come pick me up.

subtitles.original: わかったらかしずいて手を取って「おひめさま」
subtitles.english: If you understand, kneel down, take my hand, and say 'Princess'.

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything.

subtitles.original: でもね 少しくらい叱ってくれたっていいのよ
subtitles.english: But you know, it's okay to scold me just a little bit.

subtitles.original: 世界で私だけのおうじさま
subtitles.english: My one and only prince in the world,

subtitles.original: 気がついて ほらほら
subtitles.english: notice me, look, look.

subtitles.original: おててが空いてます
subtitles.english: My hand is free.

subtitles.original: うーっ！
subtitles.english: Uhh!
